definition: to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things
to pay/to invest (energy or time in a friendship etc)
to handle/to deal with/to cope/to get by with
to pay a sum of money/payment
to pay sb else's expense with the expectation of being reimbursed by that person later
to pay in full/to pay all of a bill/to pay off
to apply to/to put into (practice etc)/to put to (a test, a vote etc)

sentences.english: The man took it and asked what he had to pay his shave.
sentences.chinese: 卖扫帚的人拿回了扫帚，随后问修面要付多少钱。

sentences.english: I will do it provided (or providing) that I am paid.
sentences.chinese: 只要付我一些钱，我就肯做。

sentences.english: He explained that he was robbing the bank because Santa had to pay his elves.
sentences.chinese: 他竟然说抢银行是为了要给小精灵们付工钱。

sentences.english: Yvette is now paying more than when she was renting. Is this a problem?
sentences.chinese: 伊薇特现付更多的时候她是租用比。

sentences.english: He also decided to pay the insignificant fare by himself.
sentences.chinese: 并且他决定自己出钱付那微不足道的船费。

sentences.english: I paid $320 at the duty-free shop.
sentences.chinese: 我在免税商店付了320美元。
旅客付了直到拉尼的车费。
他给临时来照看孩子的保姆付了钱。

sentences.english: Sam says, "The landlord pays for the gas, but the tenant pays for all other utilities."
sentences.chinese: 山姆说，“房主付气费，租赁者付其他所有费用。”

sentences.english: People sometimes do have to pay part of the cost of drugs that doctor prescribes.
sentences.chinese: 人们有时须为医生处方付部份费用。

sentences.english: All we have to pay for is the building materials.
sentences.chinese: 我们只要付建筑材料费。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the legal features of abandonment in ship insurance.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了船舶保险中委付的法律特征。

sentences.english: By doing that, you would show your support for further development and improvement of Sandboxie.
sentences.chinese: 一旦您付了费，您就能获得进一步的支持及更新服务。

sentences.english: He has a little room on the Rue Condorcet for which he pays sixty francs a month.
sentences.chinese: 他在孔多塞街有一问小房子，每月付六十法郎房租。

sentences.english: I propose to repay the loan at$20 a month.
sentences.chinese: 我提议每月付还贷款20美元。

definition: to pay in full/to pay all of a bill/to pay off
to pay a sum of money/payment
to pay sb else's expense with the expectation of being reimbursed by that person later
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
to pay back in full/to redeem a debt
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
